title: Enable tab completion of the suite namespace
content:
OMT assigns a unique namespace for each SMA suite installation: itsma-xxxxx (xxxxx is a randomly generated string). Although you can run the kubectl get ns command to get the suite namespace, it's more convenient if you enable tab completion of the suite namespace. By doing so, whenever you need to enter the suite namespace in a command, you can simply enter itsma and then press the Tab key on your keyboard.

To enable auto completion of the suite namespace by using the Tab key, perform the following steps on each of the control plane nodes and worker nodes:

  1. Make sure that OMT is already installed. This is to ensure that you can run the kubectl command.
  2. Log in to machine as root or a sudo user.
  3. Run the following commands: 
    source <(kubectl completion bash)
echo "source <(kubectl completion bash)" >> ~/.bashrc
echo "source <(kubectl completion bash)" >>/etc/profile
  4. Enter the following command to verify: 
    kubectl get pods -n <suite namespace>

    For <suite namespace>, enter itsma and then press the Tab key. The namespace should be automatically completed. Next time, as long as you log in to the machine as the same user, you can always enter the suite namespace in this way.
